description: This table contains related response information about the credit card transaction associated with an e-visit encounter that is stored in the patient record when the encounter is created.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number is unique across all patients and all contacts.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the contact owner.

columns.name: CR_TX_AMOUNT_AUTH
columns.description: The amount authorized on the credit card.

columns.name: CR_TX_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant the status was updated.

columns.name: CR_TX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status of the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Charged


Cancelled


Failed

columns.name: CARDHOLDER_NAME
columns.description: To store the name of the pre-auth credit card holder .

columns.name: CREDIT_CARD_BRAND_C_NAME
columns.description:
To store the card brand of the pre-auth credit card


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Visa


MasterCard


American Express


Discover


Diners Club


Health Benefit


Bank Account (Unknown Type)


Checking Account


Savings Account


Other

columns.name: EXP_MONTH
columns.description: To store the expiration month of the pre-auth credit card

columns.name: EXP_YEAR
columns.description: To store the expiration year of the pre-auth credit

columns.name: TX_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the transaction source application for copay only pre-authorized transactions. For example, it will store "MyChart Web" for a payment made via MyChart website. 


May contain organization-specific values: No

columns.description:
Stores the digital wallet used to make the credit card payment

columns.name: CR_LAST_FOUR
columns.description: Stores the last four digits of the payment method used to make a pre-authorization for a copay.
